entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
